feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.4
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(Tables): added ability to rename fields (#7142) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • fix(hubspot): convert checkbox property to static dropdown (#7138) @kishanprmr
  • feat(pieces): Add Chainalysis Screening API integration piece (#6951) @ahmad-swanblocks
  • feat(slack): retrieve slack thread messages action (#7129) @flex-yeongeun
  • feat: new google slide piece (#7128) @Kevinyu-alan
  • fix(onedrive): fix download file and list files action (#7047) @kishanprmr
  • fix: image to pdf extension check (#7127) @danielpoonwj

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: stop redirecting to sign in page, if user was deleted and refreshed in embedding mode (#7134) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore(deps): bump tj-actions/changed-files from 44 to 46 in /.github/workflows (#7130) @dependabot

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @ahmad-swanblocks, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @danielpoonwj, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @flex-yeongeun, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: introduce manual tasks feature (#7055) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat(slack): new message in channel, new direct message trigger & get file action (#7067) @kishanprmr
  • fix(grist): fix default workspace (#6847) @revolunet
  • fix(google-sheets): fix special characters breaking columns dropdown (#7038) @kishanprmr
  • feat(sftp): add option to allow connecting to ftps server with a self-signed certificate (#7143) @janwytze

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: prevent crashing in data selector (#7149) @abuaboud
  • fix: smtp port not found when inviting user (#7147) @abuaboud
  • fix: get license key from db for usage job (#7137) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add rawBody to webhook trigger payload (#7139) @AdamSelene

üìö Documentation

  • fix(docs): change AP_ENCRYPTION_KEY parameter length (#7044) @swimmwatch

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @janwytze, @kishanprmr, @revolunet and @swimmwatch
